thread.title: Training to help Ashburton offenders gain employment (Department of Corrections)
thread.title_full: Training to help Ashburton offenders gain employment (Department of Corrections) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Training to help Ashburton offenders gain employment (Department of Corrections)
text: ( Source : Department of Corrections ) Offenders on community work sentence in Ashburton have been engaged in Health and Safety training to help them to keep safe, get employment and maintain a life away from crime. Training in small machinery
